name: Wordle Infinite
description:
A replica of the popular daily word game Wordle, with unlimited playability.

In Wordle Infinite, you try to guess a word selected from 5700+ English words in maximum of 6 tries. Each try gives you a clue about the word: 

  • Green letters mean you got a matching letter in the correct spot,
  • Yellow letters mean you got a matching letter BUT in the wrong spot
  • Grey letters mean the letter isn't in the word in any spot.
